https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8BXbz4SAnNLFRa8Ug5SbDwFpnXc.jpg Prague, during World War II. Hana Kaufmann, a Jewish ophthalmologist, marries Dr. Antonín Bureš, a Christian man. When her family is sent to the Theresienstadt concentration camp, their romance turns into a struggle for survival. Distant Journey
